title: Bale picking machine. pick up bales fast and easily.

subtasks: Getting into the driving seat of the实施物
Starting the tractor engine
Selecting the appropriate gear
Adjusting the depth of the harrow
Activating the harrow's mechanism
Guiding the tractor and harrow along the rows
Monitoring the tillage process
Stopping the tractor and deactivating the harrow
Gathering seedlings from the nursery
Transporting seedlings to the field
Selecting a planting pattern
Digging holes for the seedlings
Planting the seedlings into the holes
Watering the newly planted seedlings

tasks.task: Fertilizing crops using farm machinery (pivot irrigation system)
subtasks: Checking the pivot irrigation system's hydraulic components
Adjusting the nozzle settings for optimal coverage
Ensuring even distribution of fertilizer
Monitoring the pivot's rotation
Verifying the system's position to cover the intended area

tasks.task: Harvesting crops with farm machinery (combine harvester)
subtasks: Aligning the combine harvester with the crop rows
Starting the combine's engine
Adjusting the combine's height for proper cutting
Operating the combine's cutting mechanism
Adjusting the threshing drum speed
Managing the grain conveyor
Monitoring the grain tank's level
Stopping the combine at the unloading point
Cleaning the combine and ensuring it's in good working condition
Loading the sprayer with the appropriate chemicals or fertilizers
Mixing the chemicals if necessary
Checking the sprayer's nozzles for clogs
Starting the sprayer's engine
Adjusting the spray patterns
Monitoring the spray coverage
Ensuring uniform spraying over the field
Stopping the sprayer and cleaning it after use

tasks.task: Managing livestock feed (using a bale processor)
subtasks: Preparing the bale processor for operation
Loading the bales into the processor
Activating the processor's cutting mechanism
Adjusting the processor's settings for desired particle size
Clearing any blockages in the processor
Distributing the processed feed to livestock
Identifying the mechanical or hydraulic issue with the cultivator
Gathering necessary tools and replacement parts
Disassembling the affected component
Inspecting the part for wear or damage
Replacing or repairing the faulty component
Reassembling the cultivator and testing its operation
Preparing the drone for flight
Conducting a visual inspection of the crops
Noting areas of stress or pest damage
Recording data for further analysis

tasks.task: Conducting soil testing to determine nutrient levels
subtasks: Collecting soil samples from various field locations
Mixing the collected samples for analysis
Sending the samples to a lab for testing
Interpreting the test results to inform fertilizer applications

tasks.task: Irrigating crops through a pivot system
subtasks: Activating the pivot irrigation system
Monitoring water distribution from the pivot
Ensuring the system covers the entire crop area
Adjusting the irrigation schedule based on weather conditions

tasks.task: Using a bail wrap machine to secure hay
subtasks: Operate the bail wrap machine to wind twine around a hay bale
Tightening the twine to secure the bale
Removing the completed bale from the wrapping machine
Loading herbicide into a sprayer
Calibrating the sprayer for proper herbicide application rate
Moving the sprayer through the field, avoiding overlapping passes
Ensuring even coverage of the herbicide
Loading the forage into the chopper
Starting the chopper
Ensuring the cutter bar is set at the right height
Adjusting the belt or chain speed if necessary
Ensuring the proper moisture content for ensiling
Transferring the chopped material to the silo
Compacting the forage in the silo
Cleaning the combine at the end of the day (regardless of mention)
Checking the feed storage for availability
Collecting feed from storage and transporting to livestock area
